IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.\", \"path\": \"CRON_SETUP_SUMMARY.md\", \"file_content\": \"# SpinWish Server Cron Job Configuration - Complete Setup\\n\\n## \\ud83c\\udfaf Overview\\n\\nI've created a comprehensive cron job configuration system for your SpinWish Spring Boot server that provides:\\n\\n- **Automated server startup/restart** at configurable intervals (3min, 5min, 10min, etc.)\\n- **Intelligent health monitoring** with HTTP endpoint checks\\n- **Process detection** to avoid conflicts when server is already running\\n- **Comprehensive logging** with rotation and cleanup\\n- **Error handling** and recovery mechanisms\\n- **Easy installation** with guided setup script\\n- **Multiple configuration options** for different environments\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udcc1 Created Files\\n\\n```\\ncron-scripts/\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 spinwish-server-manager.sh # Main server management script\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 log-manager.sh # Log rotation and monitoring\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 spinwish-cron.conf # Configuration file\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 crontab-entries.txt # Template cron entries\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 install-cron-jobs.sh # Automated installer\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 validate-setup.sh # Setup validation\\n\\u2514\\u2500\\u2500 README.md # Comprehensive documentation\\n```\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\ude80 Quick Start\\n\\n### 1. Validate Setup\\n```bash\\n./cron-scripts/validate-setup.sh\\n```\\n\\n### 2. Install Cron Jobs\\n```bash\\n./cron-scripts/install-cron-jobs.sh\\n```\\n\\nChoose from:\\n- **Production**: Every 3 minutes + daily maintenance + weekly restart\\n- **Development**: Every 10 minutes + daily cleanup\\n- **Custom**: Choose your own intervals\\n- **Manual**: Use provided templates\\n\\n### 3. Monitor\\n```bash\\n# View active cron jobs\\ncrontab -l\\n\\n# Monitor execution\\ntail -f logs/cron/cron-execution.log\\n\\n# Check server status\\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh status\\n```\\n\\n## \\u2699\\ufe0f Key Features\\n\\n### \\ud83d\\udd04 Server Management\\n- **Smart startup**: Uses your existing `smart_start.sh` with database fallback\\n- **Process detection**: Checks if server is already running before starting\\n- **Health checks**: HTTP endpoint monitoring with configurable retries\\n- **Graceful shutdown**: SIGTERM followed by SIGKILL if needed\\n- **PID management**: Tracks server process ID for reliable control\\n\\n### \\ud83d\\udcca Health Monitoring\\n- **HTTP health checks**: Tests `/actuator/health` endpoint\\n- **Configurable timeouts**: 30-second default with 5 retries\\n- **Automatic restart**: Restarts unhealthy servers\\n- **Status reporting**: Detailed logging of all health check results\\n\\n### \\ud83d\\udcdd Logging System\\n- **Structured logging**: Timestamped entries with log levels\\n- **Automatic rotation**: Size-based rotation (50MB default)\\n- **Cleanup**: Automatic removal of old logs (7 days default)\\n- **Compression**: Gzip compression of rotated logs\\n- **Monitoring**: Alert detection for high error/restart rates\\n\\n### \\ud83d\\udee1\\ufe0f Error Handling\\n- **Retry logic**: Multiple attempts for server startup\\n- **Fallback profiles**: Automatic fallback between database configurations\\n- **Conflict prevention**: Checks for existing processes\\n- **Recovery**: Automatic restart on health check failures\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udccb Configuration Options\\n\\n### Monitoring Intervals\\n```bash\\n# High frequency (production)\\n*/3 * * * * # Every 3 minutes\\n\\n# Standard monitoring\\n*/5 * * * * # Every 5 minutes\\n\\n# Light monitoring (development)\\n*/10 * * * * # Every 10 minutes\\n\\n# Minimal monitoring\\n*/15 * * * * # Every 15 minutes\\n*/30 * * * * # Every 30 minutes\\n```\\n\\n### Server Profiles\\n- **auto**: Smart database detection (recommended)\\n- **prod**: Remote PostgreSQL with fallback\\n- **local**: Local PostgreSQL with fallback \\n- **dev**: H2 in-memory database\\n\\n### Maintenance Schedules\\n- **Daily**: Log rotation and cleanup (2:30 AM)\\n- **Weekly**: Optional server restart (Sunday 3:00 AM)\\n- **Boot**: Automatic startup on system reboot\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udd27 Customization\\n\\n### Edit Configuration\\n```bash\\nnano cron-scripts/spinwish-cron.conf\\n```\\n\\nKey settings:\\n```bash\\nPROFILE=auto # Server profile\\nSERVER_PORT=8080 # Server port\\nHEALTH_CHECK_RETRIES=5 # Health check attempts\\nHEALTH_CHECK_INTERVAL=10 # Seconds between retries\\nMAX_LOG_SIZE=50 # MB before rotation\\nLOG_CLEANUP_DAYS=7 # Days to keep logs\\n```\\n\\n### Manual Cron Setup\\nIf you prefer manual configuration, use the templates in `crontab-entries.txt`:\\n\\n```bash\\n# Edit crontab\\ncrontab -e\\n\\n# Add entries (replace /path/to/spinwish with actual path)\\n*/3 * * * * cd /path/to/spinwish && ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh cron >> logs/cron/cron-execution.log 2>&1\\n```\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udee0\\ufe0f Manual Commands\\n\\n### Server Control\\n```bash\\n# Check status\\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh status\\n\\n# Start server\\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh start\\n\\n# Stop server \\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh stop\\n\\n# Restart server\\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh restart\\n\\n# Health check only\\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh health\\n\\n# Cron-safe start (used by cron jobs)\\n./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh cron\\n```\\n\\n### Log Management\\n```bash\\n# Rotate logs\\n./cron-scripts/log-manager.sh rotate\\n\\n# Cleanup old logs\\n./cron-scripts/log-manager.sh cleanup\\n\\n# Generate summary\\n./cron-scripts/log-manager.sh summary\\n\\n# Full maintenance\\n./cron-scripts/log-manager.sh full-maintenance\\n```\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udcca Monitoring & Alerts\\n\\n### Log Files\\n```\\nlogs/cron/\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 cron-execution.log # Main cron output\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 server-manager.log # Server management events \\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 server-output.log # Server startup output\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 maintenance.log # Daily maintenance\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 health-check.log # Health check results\\n\\u251c\\u2500\\u2500 alerts.log # System alerts\\n\\u2514\\u2500\\u2500 log-summary.txt # Daily summary\\n```\\n\\n### Alert Conditions\\n- High error count (>10 errors/24h)\\n- Frequent restarts (>5 restarts/24h) \\n- High disk usage (>80%)\\n- Failed health checks\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udd12 Security & Permissions\\n\\n- **User context**: Runs as the installing user (no root required)\\n- **File permissions**: Scripts executable (755), configs readable (644)\\n- **Process isolation**: Uses existing project permissions\\n- **Log security**: Logs stored in project directory\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udc1b Troubleshooting\\n\\n### Common Issues\\n\\n1. **Cron jobs not running**\\n ```bash\\n # Check cron service\\n sudo systemctl status cron\\n \\n # View cron logs\\n sudo tail -f /var/log/cron\\n \\n # Verify crontab\\n crontab -l\\n ```\\n\\n2. **Server not starting**\\n ```bash\\n # Test manually\\n ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh start\\n \\n # Check logs\\n tail -f logs/cron/server-manager.log\\n ```\\n\\n3. **Health checks failing**\\n ```bash\\n # Test endpoint\\n curl -s http://localhost:8080/actuator/health\\n \\n # Check server logs\\n tail -f backend/logs/spring.log\\n ```\\n\\n### Validation\\nRun the validation script to check your setup:\\n```bash\\n./cron-scripts/validate-setup.sh\\n```\\n\\n## \\ud83d\\udcc8 Recommended Configurations\\n\\n### Production Environment\\n```bash\\n# Every 3 minutes monitoring\\n*/3 * * * * cd /path/to/spinwish && ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh cron >> logs/cron/cron-execution.log 2>&1\\n\\n# Daily maintenance at 2:30 AM\\n30 2 * * * cd /path/to/spinwish && ./cron-scripts/log-manager.sh full-maintenance >> logs/cron/maintenance.log 2>&1\\n\\n# Weekly restart on Sunday at 3:00 AM\\n0 3 * * 0 cd /path/to/spinwish && ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh restart >> logs/cron/weekly-restart.log 2>&1\\n\\n# Boot-time startup\\n@reboot cd /path/to/spinwish && sleep 60 && ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh start >> logs/cron/boot-start.log 2>&1\\n```\\n\\n### Development Environment\\n```bash\\n# Every 10 minutes monitoring\\n*/10 * * * * cd /path/to/spinwish && ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh cron >> logs/cron/cron-execution.log 2>&1\\n\\n# Daily cleanup at 2:00 AM\\n0 2 * * * cd /path/to/spinwish && ./cron-scripts/log-manager.sh cleanup >> logs/cron/cleanup.log 2>&1\\n\\n# Boot-time startup\\n@reboot cd /path/to/spinwish && sleep 30 && ./cron-scripts/spinwish-server-manager.sh start >> logs/cron/boot-start.log 2>&1\\n```\\n\\n## \\u2705 Next Steps\\n\\n1. **Run validation**: `./cron-scripts/validate-setup.sh`\\n2. **Install cron jobs**: `./cron-scripts/install-cron-jobs.sh`\\n3. **Monitor first execution**: `tail -f logs/cron/cron-execution.log`\\n4. **Test manual
